message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $11,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value to me is quite high. Let's meet in the middle - how about $10,500?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can only go up to $9,800.
